description: 1987 MERCEDES BENZ 560 SL CONVERTIBLE. BLACK PEARL WITH GRAY INTERIOR. MATCHING BLACK PEARL HARDTOP, BLACK SOFTTOP. CHROME WIRE WHEELS. 59,162 MILES. STUNNING CAR. DRIVES SUPERB.

Offered for sale, from KURT TANNER MOTORCARS, is this striking 560 SL in a rare and much sought-after factory color scheme. This car was just purchased from a dealer in the Pacific Northwest who recently spent plenty with a Mercedes-Benz specialist, for a comprehensive service after some years in storage. As a result, this car runs and drives wonderfully well, and presents beautifully in it's original colors.

The paint on this car is remarkably all original, save for a minor blend on the rear tonneau panel/hardtop landing area. It is overall to the excellent Mercedes Benz paint standards of the era, with quality materials. The paint is beautiful and shows only a few door dings from use, a few minor chips, and slight lifting of the clear around the driver's mirror.

The car's interior is also fantastically original, showing very little use. The dashboard is truly perfect. The seats and armrest are excellent, along with the interior panels, carpets, and an extremely nice original black soft top. The hardtop is equally as nice.
The engine bay is exceptionally clean with crisp detailing.
The car is fitted with an attractive set of period chrome wire wheels, in near perfect condition. Tires are newer quality Michelin radials.
The car starts easily on the key, is very well tuned, and runs and drives perfectly like it should, with these low miles.
Overall, this desirable and attractive 560 SL in this sought after color scheme is a rare find in such fantastic original condition.
Please look at all pictures and call or email with any questions.

This 1988 Mercedes-Benz 560SL is finished in red over a black interior, the car is said to retain its original paint, leather upholstery canvas top and hard top are in excellent condition. The car has a documented service history from February 2002 to present and most recently received oil and filter change and a tire rotation at the mercedes local dealer, also the AC was recently converted to a R134 and a new engine hood pad was installed, it has a clean Carfax report and a Texas clear title in the seller's name.Chromed wheels are 15" x 7" and wear Pirelli tires, the carpeting and leather upholstery are in perfect condition, the dash board is in mint condition with no cracks, everything on the instrumental cluster is working perfect, an aftermarket radio is currently mounted but the original Becker unit is included, original tool kit is included, hard top stand is included.Always well maintained, the car is also in great shape mechanically. the original 5.6L V8 starting up effortlessly, idling consistently and pulling strong and smoothly each of the gears. The undercarriage is entirely original and rust-free, as is the rest of the carThe AC, Heater, cruise control, automatic windows, automatic right mirror are in perfect working conditions. Everything works on this car except for the aftermarket radio and the automatic antenna. All buyers are more than welcome to do a driving test, I have more pictures that I can sent if you request it

Offered here is a very clean and sharp California 1988 Mercedes 560 SL hardtop-roadster.  The mileage on this car is exceptionally low at 65,313 miles.  The current lady owner is the second owner and pride of ownership is evident.  The car received a professional repaint some time in the past and the finish remains in overall excellent condition with some minor flaws. Sheepskin seat covers were purchased to protect the leather.  The dash shows virtually as-new while many of these cars have scratches and cracks due to age and the environment.  A aftermarket stereo is installed.  The condition of the convertible soft top is unknown since the hardtop has never been removed.  The engine and bay are clean and dry and the car starts and runs great.  The red exterior with camel interior is an extremely handsome color combination.  560 SL values are trending higher and are now being sought after by collectors and investors.  If you are seeking a 560 SL of this year you have located your car.
I believe whoever takes delivery of this vehicle will be thrilled.
For additional information please phone Dave Henry at 805 705-4924.

The interior is in excellent condition.

The air conditioning system has also been changed over to 134A.

Gateway Classic Cars is excited to offer this 1981 Mercedes Benz 380SL.For Sale in our Atlanta showroom is this 1981 Mercedes Benz 380SL. Mercedes Benz revamped its SL lineup of sporting luxury convertibles with the introduction of the 380SL. The 380 was a further development of the R107 chassis which was first used in 1972 by the 350SL and then later by the 450SL. Like its forebears the 380SL was a heady mix of V8 power refined luxury and sporty underpinnings and it was a very popular model during its run in the US. The 380SL so named for it"??s 3.8L V8 had a smaller engine than the 450SLand was consequently 120 pounds lighter. This is a nicely restored low mileage vehicle looks as good as it sounds. It is silver with a grey interior. It is loaded with usual features in an 80"??s Mercedes. The engine was rebuilt with less than 150m miles since the rebuild. Its fresh paint is PPG with Matrix European Clearcoat. It also comes with a hardtop a stand for the hardtop a fitted cover for the car. Come see it and take home and enjoy the top down in this beautiful weather. It may not be here long. To view this car in greater detail including 100+ HD photos and HD video please visit us at www.gatewayclassiccars.com and click on Atlanta. For more information please call the Atlanta showroom at 678-894-4833 or email us at

PPW Motorcars is pleased to offer what is the finest Mercedes-Benz 450SL that we have had to date. This beautiful and highly original 1975 Mercedes-Benz 450SL, which was exquisitely ordered in the iconic Astral Silver over a soft, supple, and original Blue Leather Interior is as good as they come. This particular example has been ordered with every option available; fitted with Climate Control Air Conditioning, Astral Silver Paint, Blue Leather Seats, Cruise Control, Power Windows, Hardtop, Right Outside Mirror, Fully Functioning Becker Europa Stereo, Electric Antenna, and Original Condition Polished Wheels (Most all are Silver or Chrome). Setting this vehicle apart from all others, aside from mileage is the wonderful condition and complete documentation from the day it was delivered new to the day it arrived to us. Having been lovingly cared for by just two owners from new this example has been meticulously cared for with an ‘open checkbook philosophy' and all service records retained to show exactly what was done, at what mileage, and at what cost. This is one of the only truly complete examples available with all books, manuals, a fully stamped Mercedes-Benz service booklet, dozens of service records, jack, spare tire, and best of all, the original window sticker! Further, this magnificent motorcar is incredibly original. The entire interior is as it came from the factory and everything is functioning. There is no dye work, nothing replaced, nothing cracked, etc. The interior is a time capsule and a testament to how it was kept. Another nice and unusual appointment are the polished wheels. Whereas most were either silver or chrome from the factory, even those that were polished were almost all chromed or painted as the surface is so delicate. These wheels are completely original and if you look at the dozens of other cars out there, this is the only one that has such incredible condition AND originality. We are proud to offer what we believe to be one of, if not the best example of the coveted 450SL Mercedes available anywhere. Offered to the collector, enthusiast, or investor who appreciates the magnificent investment potential of this magnificent motorcar! Bid with confidence-you will not be disappointed in this truly amazing motorcar!
Call us for a complete walk around; we will supply you with a detailed description and answer any questions you may have!
